author: Universal Pictures
description:
Ice Cube (O'Shea Jackson Jr.), Dr. Dre (Corey Hawkins), and Eazy-E (Jason Mitchell) link up for the first time with DJ Yella and MC Ren to form N.W.A. in a Compton garage.

Film Synopsis: 
Straight Outta Compton tells the true story of how five young cultural rebels - armed only with their lyrics, swagger, bravado and raw talent - stood up to the authorities that meant to keep them down and formed the world's most dangerous group, N.W.A.
